s.text: When he writes moving, interesting drama, he doesn't.
Eszterhas is reminiscent of Playboy 's Hugh Hefner: They share the same exaggerated sense of importance, the same pontificating humorlessness about their ridiculous jobs.
(No surprise that Playboy 's April issue publishes a long interview with Eszterhas.)
(Eszterhas' sex fixation is legendary and comical: His original draft of One Night Stand [1997] opened with a 65-page description of a marathon sex session.)
(Eszterhas' sex fixation is legendary and comical: His original draft of One Night Stand [1997] opened with a 65-page description of a marathon sex session.)
(Eszterhas' sex fixation is legendary and comical: His original draft of One Night Stand [1997] opened with a 65-page description of a marathon sex session.)
This is Eszterhas' tragedy and the dark side of his celebrity.
